interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Splendora Sugar Lip Scrub - Peach - (20g / 0.7oz.)
Review Date: 2020/06/29
Store: Splendora
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Splendora', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating', 'Material Feature': 'Certified Organic', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '1.73 x 1.73 x 1.34 inches; 0.7 Ounces', 'UPC': '736640550444'}
Review Text: This is a must-have especially during the winter when the wind hits your lips and they become dry and chapped. It gets all the dry flaky dead skin off of your lips leaving them super soft and supple. Not the mention the product itself smells and tastes great. 10/10!
Review Title: Kissable Lips!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
UV Light for Nails,LKE Curing Lamp for Gel Nail Polish 54W UV Led Light Gel Nail Starter Kit Nail Dryer Accessories LKE {'Brand': 'LKE', 'Light Source Type': 'LED', 'Number of Light Sources': '2', 'Wattage': '54 watts', 'Control Method': 'App', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.45 x 8.7 x 5.08 inches; 2 Pounds', 'Batteries': '1 Lithium Ion batteries required.'} I just wan't ya'll to know.. I have never given myself a gel polish manicure in my LIFE before yesterday. I had been wanting to for the longest time, but I wasn't 100% prepared to make the commitment to purchasing the light and the top coats and the bottom coats and the paint, etc, etc..

Well if you are on the fence, jump it!

First of all, the lamp works. You set your timer and once you do that, all you have to do is put your hand it and it starts automatically. Awesome! Like a real salon. I was able to do my hands in 45 minutes. It would have been even faster but I did a test run on my thumb before doing them all at once to make sure I didn't mess anything up.

Overall, I am SO happy to have this nail curing lamp! Salon Perfect Nails! NeWisdom 72 PCS Toddler Girls Hair Accessory Set with Gift Packing Organization Box, Gifts for Grandkids, Cute Hair Bows Hair Clips Hair Bands for Girls Toddlers, Multi-Style Elastic Hair Ties Hair Accessories for Baby Girls Age 3 4 5 6 NeWisdom {'Brand': 'NeWisdom', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'GirlsKit', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Babies', 'Embellishment': 'Bow', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '10.83 x 7.28 x 1.77 inches; 14.57 Ounces', 'Manufacturer recommended age': '5 months and up', 'Item model number': 'NW-GirlsKit-36Grid', 'Department': 'Baby-girls', 'UPC': '778942698455', 'Manufacturer': 'NeWisdom'} I think the pony tail holders may work for my little girls but the clips - definitely not. The clips are literally all the same just with different accessories glued on. I'm sure my girls will be able to use them on their dolls. Such a shame. The organizer box though is nice! I'm sure I'll be able to use it for something else. Junky Jade Roller Microneedle Derma Roller 3 in 1 for Face Massager Tools Set, Beautlinks Real Natural Rose Quartz for Anti Aging Relaxing Eye Puffiness Wrinkles for Face Eyes Neck Body Beautlinks {'Package Dimensions': '6.85 x 6.3 x 1.73 inches; 10.41 Ounces', 'UPC': '741376342409', 'Manufacturer': 'Beautlinks'} I love having this Rose Quartz Roller Face Massager for applying all types of face masks and treatments to the face.

When I put a facemask on I like to roll this over it. The rose quartz feels cool and it just feels so refreshing on the face and neck. It's also easy to clean which is nice. I also apply some lotions / creams with it. I like to apply my hyaluronic acid with this. It seems like it works better than using my fingers alone.

What has really impressed me though is the Microneedle Derma Roller. I only use it a few times a week but I really feel like it has helped with my dry flaky skin around my t-zone which has always been a problem for me. My face has never looked better!! Elevate for Facials! FULL SPECTRUM BODY OIL, Organic Blend of Marula, Lavender, Cedarwood, Ylang Ylang, MCT Coconut with Vitamin E, for Dry Skin, Scalp, Face, Hands, & Nails for Women MADE FRESH EARTH CHEMISTRY SINCE 4.6 BILLION YEARS {'Package Dimensions': '6.73 x 3.5 x 3.39 inches; 10.51 Ounces', 'UPC': '080101444439'} If you are an ashy kind of gal then you need some body in your life!

I'm always up for trying something new so I was excited to try this ULTRA LIGHT FULL SPECTRUM BODY OIL.

I think it works best if you put it on while your skin is still damp right out of the bath or a shower. I also try to exfoliate a little bit especially on my legs and other problem areas like elbows and knees.

It's lightly scented which I like because if it's too overpowering it can really flare up my allergies.

I wouldn't use something like this on my face because I do tend to be on the oily side. But for the body it really works great! Excellent for Dry Skin Veta – Lash and Eyebrow Serum – 2-in-1 Lash & Brow Pen – Produces Longer, Healthier, Denser Lashes and Thicker Brows – Eyelash Serum – Boosts Skin Collagen – Drug-Free Formula - 1 fl oz. Veta {'Color': 'Silver, Black', 'Brand': 'Veta', 'Item Form': 'lotion', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.2 x 1.61 x 1.57 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'UPC': '861121002645'} I'm not even going to lie to ya'll... I wear my mascara thick with multiple layers. This makes it SO hard for me to get off. It's not unusual for me to accidentally pull out my eyelashes trying to get my mascara off. This has left my eyelashes looking very sad. I decided to give this a go and I think I see results. My problem is I am defeating the purpose by wearing too much mascara! I think I just need to invest in some fake lashes. I see some results 13.5 fl. Oz. Goat Milk Facial Cleanser, Moisturizing Face Wash for Women, Hydrating Natural Face Wash, Anti-aging Face Wash, Face Wash for Aging Ski L&I Apothecary {'Item Form': 'Foam', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'L&I Apothecary', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Material Feature': 'Natural, Cruelty Free', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.06 x 4.25 x 4.13 inches; 1.38 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'LI-BB', 'UPC': '781490943212', 'Manufacturer': 'The Henna Guys, Inc.'} I don't know what it is about goat milk soap/cleansers, but they are so luxurious! This is no exception. I have a pre-teen daughter who is on the cusp of puberty and has been suffering from a little acne. She has extremely sensitive skin so this face wash was the perfect option for her. It has kept her face clear from blemishes without drying out her skin. Fresh & Clean Splendora Sugar Lip Scrub - Peach - (20g / 0.7oz.) Splendora {'Brand': 'Splendora', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating', 'Material Feature': 'Certified Organic', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '1.73 x 1.73 x 1.34 inches; 0.7 Ounces', 'UPC': '736640550444'} This is a must-have especially during the winter when the wind hits your lips and they become dry and chapped. It gets all the dry flaky dead skin off of your lips leaving them super soft and supple. Not the mention the product itself smells and tastes great. 10/10! Kissable Lips!
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Interest in Nail Care**: Strong preference for DIY nail care, particularly gel manicures, committed to achieving salon-quality results at home.
- **First-Time User**: Recently started using gel polish, showcasing a willingness to learn and engage with new beauty techniques.
- **Positive Experience with Technology**: Values user-friendly technology, enjoying ease of use with gel curing lamps.
- **Emphasis on Efficiency**: Prioritizes quick application in manicures and beauty routines, seeking time-saving solutions.
- **Encouraging for Others**: Actively recommends products to friends and family, sharing positive experiences and guiding hesitant users in the beauty community.
- **Satisfaction with Purchases**: Generally pleased with beauty tools and products acquired, fostering a favorable view of future acquisitions.
- **Diverse Interests**: Recently expanded interests now include lip care, particularly exfoliating products, as well as skincare tools and moisturizing items for dry skin, with a focus on enhancing lash and brow health.
- **Critical Evaluation**: Balances positive and negative feedback in product reviews, emphasizing usability and quality.
- **Practical Approach**: Values functional aspects, focusing on quality products for personal care that cater to sensitive skin.
- **Curiosity and Adaptability**: Open to trying new products that enhance overall skin health, demonstrating increasing engagement with skincare, particularly for sensitive skin concerns.

Overall, the user demonstrates a commitment to enhancing their beauty routines, integrating new lip and skincare products while maintaining a critical yet positive outlook in evaluations.
